stepAnswer: ΔH < $$0$$ and T is very low
stepTitle: A chemical reaction has a negative change in entropy (ΔS < 0). Under which of the following conditions would the reaction be spontaneous at a given temperature T?
answerLatex: ΔH < $$0$$ and T is very low
choices: ΔH < $$0$$ and T is very high
ΔH > $$0$$ and T is very high
ΔH > $$0$$ and T is very low
ΔH < $$0$$ and T is very low
